product_name: Carve Designs Paris T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Look like you're fresh from the French Riviera or perhaps a cruise ship in the Bahamas when you wear the women's Carve Designs Paris T-Shirt with its boat-neck and and 3/4-length sleeves. Soft blend of organic cotton and rayon has spandex for comfort stretch. Wide cuffs and shoulder inset show a contrast color. Closeout.
short_description: Look like you're fresh from the French Riviera or perhaps a cruise ship in the Bahamas when you wear the women's Carve Designs Paris T-Shirt with its boat-neck and and 3/4-length sleeves.
